topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5550343063687235b84f3100#post_5550343063687235b84f3100
Electrical tape actually. Rubber bands snap too easily and could cause harm to the croc. Whenever they need to be muzzled a handler usually applies electrical tape because it's stretchy and the adhesive dissolves in water.
